programme.desc: Cat And Mouse Burglars / Caterpillar And Mouse / The Pied Piper Of Harlem / Lazy Jerry - A pop star checks into the Hotel, Jerry's caterpillar friend hides and more.

programme.title: A Dog Year
programme.desc: A 50-something writer in a mid-existential crisis impulsively adopts a collie. The bond between him and the dog transforms in meaningful, unexpected ways.

programme.title: Saving My Tomorrow: Kids Who Love The Earth
programme.desc: This HBO documentary features kids from around the world as they take on our biggest environmental challenges.

programme.title: Summer Days, Summer Nights
programme.desc: On the south shore of Long Island in the summer of 1983, a group of working-class teenagers and 20-somethings work their summer jobs, fall in and out of love, and wrestle with what the future holds when the summer ends and the real world beckons.

programme.title: Malory Towers S2 Ep6
programme.desc: The Runaway - After flunking a class test, an anxious Ellen disappears - the girls must scour the school to find her!

programme.title: Malory Towers S2 Ep7
programme.desc: The Play - Its open day at Malory Towers and the second form girls must impress a potential investor for the school.

programme.title: Christmas Carole
programme.desc: Meet Carole McKay, she doesn't love Christmas at all. But this Christmas Eve, Carole's past, present and future are about to collide.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep41
programme.desc: A Sleepless Night - The pistol on a flower in the mountains is the Bobobobobone. Deca and Shiro must wake up all night as it only blossoms for a second.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep42
programme.desc: The Super Hero Catches A Cold - Deca hears information about the Bobobobobone and races to its location but finds Shiro ill with a cold. Will Deca finally get the Bobobobobone?

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep43
programme.desc: Run, Run Away, And Run After - From one place to the other, Shiro and Deca chase after each other nonstop! CanCan appears, and they become even more excited!

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep44
programme.desc: The Mysterious Bobobobobone - A book in the library might be the Bobobobobone. While Deca and Shiro search, suddenly a strange dog speaks to them from the bookshelves.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep45
programme.desc: Popopopopopcorn - When the popcorn pops in the popcorn factory, it turns into the Bobobobobone. Shiro and Deca endlessly make popcorn with rhythm.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep46
programme.desc: The Elegant Laundry Work - The Bobobobobone is in one of the laundries of a big family hanging outside to dry. Suddenly it starts to rain, and Shiro and Deca quickly takes them inside

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep47
programme.desc: The Enormous Watermelon - The Bobobobone is a watermelon. Shiro finds Deca at the watermelon field with a gadget that can change the size of its target.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep48
programme.desc: The Department Store At Midnight - The Bobobobobone is in the department store. Shiro finds it, but will this be the end of the his life as a Super Hero?

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Assault On Pancake Palace - When Gwen enters a pancake-eating contest at the world-famous Pancake Palace, Ben spots the Bugg Brothers and must stop them before they obtain an endless supply of what fuels their creations.

programme.desc: Wash Day - Its Wash Day and Gabrielle gets to spend a special time with her Auntie Kayla who combs, shampoos, conditions and detangles Gabrielles hair.

programme.desc: Community Garden Clean-Up - When a windstorm blows everything down in the Community Garden, everybody comes together to help clean it up as the garden belongs to everyone.

programme.desc: The Play - Its open day at Malory Towers and the second form girls must impress a potential investor for the school.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Bizarre Biscuit Factory - The Bobobobobone gives one the power to conquer the world. Shiro heads to the biscuit factory, where he finds himself fighting over the Bobobobobone with Deca.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Snatch The Egg! - Shiro and Deca fight on a balloon as they go in search of the Bobobobobone! Will Shiro be able to protect a heron's eggs from a violent Deca and finally acquire the Bobobobobone?

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Summer Break Exercise - Traces of the Bobobobobone are found at a riverbed. As Shiro is about to jet out to the riverbed, his owner, Shin Chan, decides to take him for a walk.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Bouncy Bridge Rhapsody - Aura the fickle crow secretly eavesdrops on Shiro and Be-boo's conversation. Shiro heads to the river island of Kaskabe Canyon in Block 7 in search of the Bobobobobone.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Uncool Coldness - Shiro travels to a refrigerated warehouse. Deca, who is prepared for the cold, takes the lead. Shiro starts to get sleepy. Will he be able to find the Bobobobobone and escape?

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep12
programme.desc: The Birth Of A Super Hero - Shiro finally finds the Bobobobobone. As he prepares to transfer it to the Space Headquarters, he reflects on the day he became a superhero. It was an ordinary sunny day

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep14
programme.desc: Enchanting Cancan - This time, traces of the Bobobobobone are found in a pancake. While on his mission, Shiro's nose picks up a good scent. He is distracted by the smell and takes a detour.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Umbrellas Are Easily - One of the umbrellas in the lost-and-found centre at the train station is the Bobobobobone. Shiro is surprised at the number of lost-and-found items. Deca attacks Shiro.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep18
programme.desc: Bo Bo Bottles - Tomorrow is bottle collection day and traces of the Bobobobobone are found in the bottles. Shiro and Deca try to find the Bobobobobone before it falls into human hands.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep20
programme.desc: Cancan Loves The Swing - CanCan wants to go on the swing at the park. Shiro and Deca stand in line just for her. When they finally get to the front, they find traces of the Bobobobobone on the swing.

programme.title: Super Shiro S1 Ep41
programme.desc: A Sleepless Night - The pistol on a flower in the mountains is the Bobobobobone. Deca and Shiro must wake up all night as it only blossoms for a second.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 Ep22
programme.desc: Half-Sies - During a trip to the Lake of the Ozarks, Ben and Gwen squabble over Ben's 'half-birthday' celebration, but when Max gets word of a suspicious rockslide, the cousins must put aside their differences.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 Ep23
programme.desc: Xingo's Back - Left to entertain himself as Max takes a well-deserved nap, Ben stumbles upon a Xingo arcade game and goes OE-Shock Rock to power it up, but it, unfortunately, receives too much juice.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 Ep24
programme.desc: Bounty Ball - While Gwen listens to a lecture on the Transcontinental Railroad, Ben sneaks away to the gift shop. When the Bounty Hunters appear and corner Ben, Gwen must use what she learnt to help him escape.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 Ep25
programme.desc: Fear The Fogg - As Max attempts to get Ben and Gwen to the Four Corners Monument before sunset, an ominous fog bank engulfs the roadway and forces Max to drive at a snail's pace.

programme.title: Ben 10 S2 Ep26
programme.desc: The Charm Offensive - After Ben gets too much publicity for his alien-antics in Fort Knox, a jealous Gwen feels unappreciated and looks to ease her pain with ice cream. She is soon confronted by Charmcaster.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry In New York S2 Ep5
programme.desc: To Your Health / Golf Brawl / Tom's Swan Song / King Spike The First And Last - A health inspector calls on the Hotel and more.

programme.title: Tom And Jerry In New York S2 Ep6
programme.desc: Planet Of The Mice / Ball Of Fun / Big Apple / Flamingo A-Go-Go - Tom has a nightmare, Jerry inherits a hamster ball and more!

programme.desc: Love Makes A Family - Relatives from all over come to celebrate Family Day! Big Bird wonders if his Granny Bird will be able to make it to the party. She surprises him!

programme.title: Sesame Street S53 Ep32
programme.desc: Gabrielle's Amazing Maze - Gabrielle, Elmo, Abby, and Cookie Monster are building a maze for Gabrielles class pet hamster, Peanut Butter.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go! & Dc Super Hero Girls: Mayhem In The Multiverse
programme.desc: What do you get when you combine the DC Super Hero Girls, the Legion of Doom and Teen Titans Go! with a dash of an ancient Kryptonian goddess? A recipe for pandemonium! With the help of an amulet from Krypton, Lex Luthor unites a group of Super-Villains to capture all of Earth's Super Heroes, leaving only the DC Super Hero Girls to stop the Legion of Doom. The girls must cross dimensions to rescue their fellow heroes from the Phantom Zone, but a mix-up leads them to the wrong universe. Get sucked into the chaos as this who's who of the DC Universe battles together to save the world in an epic multiverse event!

programme.desc: The ever charming and now slightly older Chaos Mathematician Dr. Ian Malcolm retells the tale of what happened that dreadful night at Jurassic Park.

programme.desc: Tonight, Michael tries to pull a fast one on burger joint patrons with his inflatable hot dogs and his unusual technique for bagging buns. Then he creeps out a flea market vendor when he brings an acrylic encased arachnid back to life, and later his co-worker doesn't give a hoot about her job at the camping store when an owl takes over their display.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 12
programme.desc: Michael hits the jackpot at a convenience store and amazes a mother when he demonstrates her child's genius abilities at a toy store. Later, MIchael astonishes his Japanese restaurant co-worker with a set-up that really takes the cake.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S2 13
programme.desc: Michael leaves a co-worker out to dry at the garden center with a technologically confounding hose that wirelessly transmits water. Later, at the dog groomers, Michael's puppy takes to the catwalk after dressing himself in the most fashionable canine attire.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S3 10
programme.desc: Sheldon takes on his greatest challenge when he attempts to help Penny understand physics, and Wolowitz becomes jealous when Leonard starts hanging out with his new girlfriend.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S3 11
programme.desc: A visit from Leonard's mother (guest star CHRISTINE BARANSKI) delights Sheldon and horrifies Leonard.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S3 12
programme.desc: While Sheldon and Koothrappali attend a university mixer, Leonard is upset to discover that Penny believes in psychics. DANICA McKELLAR stars as the object of Raj's attraction.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S3 13
programme.desc: When their apartment is robbed, Leonard and Sheldon turn to their friends to create a state-of-the-art security system -- and Sheldon struggles to cope.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory S3 14
programme.desc: Sheldon's case of "physicist's block" while searching for the answer to a physics problem leads him to work at the Cheesecake Factory with Penny.

programme.desc: Young Sheldon S7 1

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 11
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin head to the casino to see if they can game the system with a high stakes dice-throwing hack, and they test some surprising hacks for overcoming snoring and sleeping through the night.

programme.title: Hack My Life S3 12
programme.desc: Brooke and Kevin explore hacks that could save money on your cable bill, and Hack Master Kosta Grammatis helps Kevin fulfill his childhood laser-blast dreams. Plus, there's an ancient Egyptian hack!

programme.title: Little Nicky
programme.desc: When Satan reneges on his plans to retire, two of his three heirs leave Hell for New York City to gather enough souls to vote the Prince of Darkness out of office.

programme.title: The Wedding Singer
programme.desc: Aspiring rock 'n' roller Robbie Hart has a regular gig singing at weddings and a fiance who's about to break his heart.

programme.desc: Thonys in-laws come to Las Vegas. Meanwhile, she must help Arman by meeting with Robert Kamdar, Nadias gregarious and charming ex-lover.

programme.title: The Cleaning Lady S2 3
programme.desc: Thony must team up with Arman and Nadia in a new money-making venture to save Lucas life. Meanwhile, Fiona works to keep Chris out of trouble when the threat of evidence arises.

programme.title: Grudge Match
programme.desc: Oscar winner Robert De Niro (Raging Bull, Silver Linings Playbook) and Oscar nominee Sylvester Stallone (the Rocky films, The Expendables) play Billy The Kid McDonnen and Henry Razor Sharp, two local Pittsburgh fighters whose fierce rivalry put them in the national spotlight. Each had scored a victory against the other during their heyday, but in 1983, on the eve of their decisive third match, Razor suddenly announced his retirement, refusing to explain why but effectively delivering a knock-out punch to both their careers. Thirty years later, boxing promoter Dante Slate Jr., seeing big dollar signs, makes them an offer they cant refuse: to re-enter the ring and settle the score once and for all.

programme.title: Sleepy Princess In The Demon Castle Ep4
programme.desc: The Princess, Destruction, And A Short Journey - After being given a tiny bathtub, Princess Syalis sets out on a quest to gather materials for a big bathtub to sleep in.

programme.title: Sleepy Princess In The Demon Castle Ep5
programme.desc: The Princess And Female Warriors - A female demon tries to befriend the princess, but Princess Syalis eyes her feathers to have a good night's rest.

programme.title: Sleepy Princess In The Demon Castle Ep6
programme.desc: The Princess' Unwavering Choice - Princess Syalis accidentally spills juice on her bedsheets, so she goes around looking for ways to do her laundry.

programme.title: Sleepy Princess In The Demon Castle Ep7
programme.desc: Even More Sleepless Princess Of The Castle - The princess is abducted by Hades and brought to another castle, where she has to regather materials for good sleep.

programme.title: Sleepy Princess In The Demon Castle Ep8
programme.desc: The Princess And The Frightful Demon Nightmare - The heroes continue their quest to save Princess Syalis, but they unknowingly disrupt her sleep and give her a nightmare.

programme.desc: Iyami The Yokai's Great Love Project - Kitaro and Konaki-Jijii go mushroom-hunting. They meet a yokai, Iyami, who uses his mist on Konaki-Jijii.

programme.title: Spooky Kitaro 6 #51-97 Ep73
programme.desc: The Yamata-No-Orochi Of Greed - On the internet, there is a rumor saying that Yamata-no-Orochi in Mt. Oguro can make any eight wishes come true.

programme.title: Spooky Kitaro 6 #51-97 Ep74
programme.desc: The Fall Of The Underworld?! Tamamo-No-Mae's Trap - Enma-Daio urges Kitaro to capture Tamamo-no-Mae. He needs the soul of the Four Generals to balance the energy in Hell.

programme.title: Spooky Kitaro 6 #51-97 Ep75
programme.desc: Kyubi No Kistune - Chasing Tamamo-no-Mae, Kitaro finally meets the last General in Hell, but she doesn't want to fight and disappears.

programme.title: Wild China S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Tibet - With splendour, scale and romance, Wild China lifts the veil on the world's most enigmatic and magnificent country, delving into its vibrant habitats to reveal a land of unbelievable natural complexity. Journey across China from the glittering peaks of the Himalayas to the barren steppe, the sub-Arctic to the tropical islands, through deserts both searingly hot and mind-numbingly cold and see, in pioneering images, a dazzling array of mysterious, beautiful, wild and rare creatures.

Journey across China from the glittering peaks of the Himalayas to the barren steppe, the sub-Arctic to the tropical islands, through deserts both searingly hot and mind-numbingly cold and see, in pioneering images, a dazzling array of mysterious, beautiful, wild and rare creatures.

programme.title: Ancient Powers S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Origins - In a brutal world where nature is both friend and foe, our ancient powers are just beginning, they must use all their skill and ingenuity to shape their territory and establish their cultures.

programme.title: Extreme Treks S3 Ep3
programme.desc: Papua New Guinea - The Kokoda Trail - The Kokoda Trail is a single file footpath that runs in a straight line through Papua New Guinea. As hot days give way to intensely cold nights, it becomes clear why so many have died from the extreme natural elements.

programme.title: Martin Clunes: Islands of the Pacific S1 Ep2
programme.desc: South West Pacific - Martin climbs an active volcano in Vanuatu, and in Tonga meets a third gender leiti and a princess. In Fiji he visits a tribe tricked out of their homeland by a British mining company.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S7 Ep9
programme.desc: Polo Mints - Gregg Wallace visits a factory with a menthol scent. The Polos factory in York produces 32 million every single day. They have been churning out these little holey wonders since 1948.

programme.title: Wild China S1 Ep3

programme.title: Ancient Powers S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Origins - In a brutal world where nature is both friend and foe, our ancient powers are just beginning, they must use all their skill and ingenuity to shape their territory and establish their cultures.

programme.title: Inside the Factory S6 Ep1
programme.desc: Cider - Gregg Wallace visits the biggest cider factory in the world, which produces more than 350 million litres each year.

programme.title: Equator From The Air S1 Ep2
programme.desc: South America - In South America, Gordon flies over the Amazon in search of illegal loggers, and in the Andes he meets conservationists searching for new species before their habitat is destroyed.

programme.title: Kate Humble's Coastal Britain S2 Ep7
programme.desc: Dover - Kate follows the iconic white cliffs of Dover on a 15-mile walk of contrasts. Kate's walk begins above Folkestone Harbour at Martello Tower 3, built to defend against Napoleon.

programme.title: How Did They Build That? S1 Ep4
programme.desc: We visit an extraordinary bridge that spans a vast valley and becomes the tallest in the world, and a luxury hotel was built upside down in an abandoned quarry in China.

programme.title: Extreme Fishing with Robson Green S3 Ep11
programme.desc: Florida - Over in the United States, Robson heads to sea to catch bull shark, blue tilapia, remora and many other fish.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Asia's Longest Day - See how creatures from the Tibetan plateau, to the lush rainforests of Thailand, to Vietnams twisted mangroves, survive four extra hours of daylight once a year, searching for food, fighting for dominance and raising their families.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep3
programme.desc: A New Zealand Christmas - See how one animal familys tragedy is anothers holiday dinner as New Zealands mainland and island creatures, including penguins, flightless birds, sea lions, and sharks, battle to feed and protect their young in this marine environment.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep4
programme.desc: India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day - Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean - Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Australian Spring Fever - Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep9
programme.desc: Crustaceans - The relationships between species like lobsters, scallops and crabs are numerous and complicated. Changing water temperature is bringing invasive species to the Wild Wild East, putting pressure on the species humans count on for important commercial harvests.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep7
programme.desc: Madagascar: Lizards and Lemurs - Meet the unique primates and reptiles searching for water and dodging predators, from ring-tailed lemurs in the east coast rainforests to tiny brown leaf chameleons, in this land of extreme climate variations and habitats.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Arabia: Kingdom of the Sun - Visit one of the most arid and hottest parts of the world to discover how dhub lizards and dromedary camels adapted to withstand the intense conditions. Then move into the more moderate southern mountains, where rare hyrax and chameleons forage.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Hot Day in the New World - Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs and tamarins from Mexico to Peru, and as far west as the Galapagos Islands, as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the suns heat, looming predators and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Asia's Longest Day - See how creatures from the Tibetan plateau, to the lush rainforests of Thailand, to Vietnams twisted mangroves, survive four extra hours of daylight once a year, searching for food, fighting for dominance and raising their families.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Australian Spring Fever - Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Baboons: Rules of the Troop
programme.desc: Baboons: Rules of the Troop - Follow four families of four different species - the resourceful Beach Troop, the warlike Desert Troop, the disciplined River Troop, and the peaceful Mountain Band - to find out why these primates are among the most successful animals in Africa.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 Ep5
programme.desc: Giant Creepy Crawlers - Crawl along with some of the worlds fiercest insects. Watch as giant cockroaches build their immune systems to ensure long life. Then check out the toxic prowess of giant millipedes and the invisibility cloaks of giant prickly stick insects.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Hot Day in the New World - Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs and tamarins from Mexico to Peru, and as far west as the Galapagos Islands, as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the suns heat, looming predators and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.desc: Asia's Longest Day - See how creatures from the Tibetan plateau, to the lush rainforests of Thailand, to Vietnams twisted mangroves, survive four extra hours of daylight once a year, searching for food, fighting for dominance and raising their families.

programme.desc: A New Zealand Christmas - See how one animal familys tragedy is anothers holiday dinner as New Zealands mainland and island creatures, including penguins, flightless birds, sea lions, and sharks, battle to feed and protect their young in this marine environment.

programme.desc: India & Sri Lanka's Deadly Mother's Day - Find out which creatures survive and whose luck will run out as animal mothers and moms-to-be struggle with sweltering temperatures, lurking predators, mating season, and drought on a day that proves to be no holiday.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep5
programme.desc: Pacific Islands: Commotion in the Ocean - Live through a sunny tropical September day with creatures from Polynesia to the Indonesian archipelago. See how the sun affects the movement, feeding habits, and mating rituals of everything from tiny zooplankton to whale sharks.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Australian Spring Fever - Celebrate the first day of spring with Aussie creatures looking for either a dinner or a date. From the kangaroos in the grasslands to the koalas in the trees to the freshwater crocodiles, they hunt for food or fight for breeding rights.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep10
programme.desc: Horses of St. Pierre & Miquelon - In the Northern Atlantic, cold Canadian waters surround eight European Islands. This is the last remaining overseas territory of France, and the summer-home to a semi-feral population of horses and ponies. Wild Wild East infiltrates the herd to explore the politics and power of horses. Meanwhile, in the waters surrounding the French archipelago, the once-vast stocks of cod fish are disappearing, changing life above the surface for humans and horses.

programme.title: Strange Creatures 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Camouflage and Colouration - Hiding in plain sight helps many insect, fish, and amphibian species survive. Learn the ins and outs of an array of animal invisibility techniques, such as warning and disruptive colouration, mimicry, and active camouflage.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 2 Ep6
programme.desc: Vancouver Island - Journey to the wild Pacific coast on the western shore of Vancouver Island in British Columbia. From the peaks of mountain glaciers to the canopies of Canadas only rainforest, nature and human spirit coexist in spectacular habitats.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Chasing Freedom - Witness veterinarian Dr. Amanda Salb save an elephant calf caught in a poachers snare, racing time to treat the wound. Back at the base, an orphaned baby baboon meets his new family. A monitor lizard and duiker are returned to freedom in the wild.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Born to Be Different - This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a duck that wont go in the water without a ride from her pooch pal, an elephant that thinks shes a buffalo, and a herd of cows that adopt an orphaned deer.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Hot Day in the New World - Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs and tamarins from Mexico to Peru, and as far west as the Galapagos Islands, as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the suns heat, looming predators and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sammi, Rose, and Casey - Roam across America with a road-tripping chicken and meet a mouse family living in an English garden. Beat arachnophobia with a spiders help, trek with the guardian of Earths last two northern white rhinos, and celebrate more interspecies pals.

programme.title: Gladiators 1 Ep4
programme.desc: Tidelands - Head to Americas far north for a peek at the ultimate fighters that live along its waterways. See a spring thaw kick off the competition, pitting eagles against herons, bears against bears, and dragonfly nymphs against venomous giant water bugs.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Born to Be Different - This episode of Amazing Animal Friends features a duck that wont go in the water without a ride from her pooch pal, an elephant that thinks shes a buffalo, and a herd of cows that adopt an orphaned deer.

programme.title: Dawn to Dusk 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Hot Day in the New World - Follow penguins, iguanas, tortoises, frogs and tamarins from Mexico to Peru, and as far west as the Galapagos Islands, as they live out their daily dramas, affected by the suns heat, looming predators and hazardous weather conditions.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep5
programme.desc: The Coast - Massive elephant seals go nose to nose to win the title of beachmaster, and giant petrels earn the nickname, murderous garbagemen. Meanwhile, a female humpback goes to extremes to protect her calf from amorous males.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep6
programme.desc: Canada - Canada, where summer is short and time is tight any time is the right time to fight. The mighty North provides the setting for bison, bald eagles, and polar bears to wage some of the most heavy-duty fighting in the animal kingdom.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep7
programme.desc: South America - From the Amazon to the Andes, South America has some beautiful scenery. From guanacos sparring over grassland, to marine iguanas head-butting over a beachhead, to home-stealing hermit crabs, the quest for real estate causes a lot of conflict.

programme.title: Battle of the Alphas 1 Ep8
programme.desc: Southeast Asia - With real-life dueling dragons, giant sumo-wrestling beetles, street-fighting monkeys, and sea turtles that play king of the hill on top of another sea turtle, Southeast Asia boasts a wide range of wildlife warriors.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 Ep11
programme.desc: Invasion - Non-native species have made their way into the Wild Wild East and staked their claim to the jagged coast. At White Point Beach Resort in Liverpool, Nova Scotia bunnies have hopped on in for an extended holiday. Its turf wars between the beachcombers and the chalets dwellers. Meanwhile, the starling population is beginning to rival gulls and pigeons.

programme.title: Mysteries of Evolution 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Head & Neck - Have you ever wondered why mandrills have such colorful faces, why vultures are bald, or even why hammerheads have, well, hammer-shaped heads? Discover how animals managed to survive by evolving from the neck up.

programme.title: Undiscovered Vistas 3 Ep1
programme.desc: Lost World of the Yucatan - The rainforest meets the Caribbean in this breathtaking region of eastern Mexico. Journey into impenetrable jungle, dive deep into mysterious underwater caves and wade through lush everglades that shelter Mexicos largest predator: Morelets crocodile.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Monkey Madness - Amanda puts a radio collar on one of the first cheetah cubs born in Malawi in twenty years and the team struggles to give a 4-meter python a physical. See a group of tourists deliver a rambunctious baby monkey they rescued from the pet trade.

programme.title: Amazing Animal Friends 1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Friend in Need - Meet more Amazing Animal Friends including Charlotte, a schnauzer who enjoys bath time with her guinea pig pal Wallace, and a randy ram called Hamish who likes to sneak off to live with a herd of dairy cows instead of his own kind.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 Ep1
programme.desc: Tropical - Circle the equator for a look at the diverse species that dwell in tropical forests. Meet a lone sloth growing a mini-forest, lemurs that share and share alike, and elephants that tend to their woodland gardens. Then explore the regions dark side.

programme.title: Secrets of the Enchanted Forests 1 Ep2
programme.desc: Seasonal - Watch the seasons wax and wane and learn how trees and animals help one another survive. Witness spring fireflies dancing after dark, discover summer fungi that cool off overheated trees, and prep for autumn migrations as the leaves begin to fall.

programme.title: Kendra Sells Hollywood S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Won't You Be My Mentor? - A hungover Kendra must keep it together when she teams up with Spencer for a listing appointment from a fan. Plus, she seeks help from an unlikely ally.

programme.title: Celebrity IOU S4 Ep11
programme.desc: Regina Hall's Monumental Thank You - Regina Hall helps her close friend and long-time makeup artist and teams up with Jonathan and Drew to transform her family's home.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home S13 Ep3
programme.desc: Second Chance Lottery - After a tough six months of recovery after a motorcycle accident, Jerry and his wife shop for their dream home in the beautiful St Augustine, Florida.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home S13 Ep4
programme.desc: Quick Cash In Cedar Rapids - A family of six was saving for their first home when they won $100,000. David hunts for a dream home near good schools and golfing in Cedar Rapids, Iowa.

programme.title: Fixer To Fabulous S4 Ep7

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep7
programme.desc: Bravery - Tired of the Mayor's needy cowardice, Puss tries to reassure him that he is a hero but being brave quickly goes to the Mayor's head.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep8
programme.desc: Golem - The Golem, a giant clay enemy Puss has been outrunning for years, comes to San Lorenzo. With Artephius' help, Puss may be able to defeat his foe.

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep23
programme.desc: King Burple - After Burple and Cutter crash-land in a village of tiny dragons, Burple's unintentional act of courage leads the locals to crown him as their king.

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep49
programme.desc: Aquadons - To escape big trouble, the Dinotrux quickly put together a raft and hit the sea. But there might be danger lurking in the water, too.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep49
programme.desc: Worst In Show/Belle Of The Gumball - Whiplash finds a perfect poodle moth to enter to compete in the show; Chet attends a gala with a rich snail after he's named "Handsomest Snail Alive".

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep49
programme.desc: Rekindling Retreat / Trashbassador - Tip and Oh accidentally go to a Couples' Retreat/Tip and Oh help Traffic Cone Larry run against Smek for a local government position

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep51
programme.desc: Lucky and the New Frontier (Part 1) - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep52
programme.desc: Lucky and the New Frontier (Part 2) - While Lucky and Spirit continue to explore a life in the circus, best friends Pru and Abigail set out to lasso in their friend back home. With new frontiers, new sights, and new friends the PALs ride free like never-before on wild circus adventures only to realize that there's no place like home.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep47
programme.desc: Punch Thunk Love / Nay Boors - When Eep and the others try to intervene with Thunk and Blurg's first date, they decide to run away so they can live happily ever after; Snoot and Ugga race each other to get to the Doomsday Skunkguin but are forced to put their differences aside once the weirder animals come out to hunt them down

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep48
programme.desc: Caverns And Creepers / Rad Teacher - When Eep is kicked out of Thunk's new imaginary role-playing adventure game she decides to play her own, real version of the game; Fed up with Squawk's mean teaching style, Eep has Grug fire him and replace him with Rad, the quintessential young, cool teacher

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep1
programme.desc: Enter the Dragon Master - After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep3
programme.desc: Blade of the Red Phoenix - Po and the kids are recruited to perform in Mei Mei's theatrical show, but things take a turn when Jindiao ruins the play in order to find a mystical scroll

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep2
programme.desc: Blue Dragon Plays with Fire - When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep17
programme.desc: Hush, Little Baby - When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep19
programme.desc: Fugitive's Day Out - Boss Baby is framed for leaking info about the Stinkless Serum to PuppyCo and must flee on the run via Errand Day with the family

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep18
programme.desc: Night of the Frodarg - On a dark and stormy night, Tim's fears of a local legend and Boss Baby's fear of a PuppyCo agent force the brothers to unite to stay safe as the house is infiltrated

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep75
programme.desc: Darkest Night - When Stoick is shot down Hiccup and the riders race back to Berk to help

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep23
programme.desc: Three Trolls-keteers / The Helper - When a neighbor asks Guy for help to fight a monster, Guy mistakes it as an invite to act in his play/Smidge sets out to help Troll Village but creates disastrous results

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep75
programme.desc: Karl-Mageddon - In honor of his retirement, Karl hosts an elaborate contest to find his successor who will become Madagascars next super villain

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep1
programme.desc: Enter the Dragon Master - After absorbing the mystical Hero Chi of the Four Constellations, four panda kids enlist the Dragon Master to teach them Kung Fu

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep2
programme.desc: Blue Dragon Plays with Fire - When the kids grow over-confident after beginning their training, they decide to intercept a distress call and sneak off without permission, only to land themselves in hot water

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep3
programme.desc: Blade of the Red Phoenix - Po and the kids are recruited to perform in Mei Mei's theatrical show, but things take a turn when Jindiao ruins the play in order to find a mystical scroll

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep21
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Problematic Pandemonium of the Punishing Plungerina - After helping George and Harold make a comic featuring the heroine Plungerina, Erica asserts that Plungerina could be better that Captain Underpants. To prove her wrong, the boys decide to actually create the villain in the comic and then have Captain Underpants save the day. Unfortunately, Krupp - and therefore Captain Underpants - is away at a principals' convention.There's no one to save them...until a real life Plungerina saves tthe day! But who is really Plungerina?

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep23
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Crazy Caustic Spray of the Contagious Cruelius Sneezer - In order to spice up their field trip to Romeinday (an ancient Rome reenactment park), George and Harold trick Melvin into turning the bus into a time machine so they can travel to actual ancient Rome and be gladiators. After offending Caesar with their comic, the emperor is accidentally turned into Cruelius Sneezer and pursues the school group with all his might.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep22
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Bombastic Blathering of Brainy Blabulous - When Krupp transfers to another school, George and Harold follow, only to find a bizarro version of Jerome Horwitz Elementary, where the teachers are nice and the kids are well-behaved. But no one's having any fun! George and Harold want to right this wrong with pranks and comics. But Krupp enlists Mr. Neamer (bizarro Meaner), who then super-enlargers his brain and becomes Brainy Blabulous, in order to stop the subversion of authority.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep17
programme.desc: Hush, Little Baby - When Frederic Estes tries to get babies banned from the local library, the babies fight back in a war for story time

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep18
programme.desc: Night of the Frodarg - On a dark and stormy night, Tim's fears of a local legend and Boss Baby's fear of a PuppyCo agent force the brothers to unite to stay safe as the house is infiltrated

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep19
programme.desc: Fugitive's Day Out - Boss Baby is framed for leaking info about the Stinkless Serum to PuppyCo and must flee on the run via Errand Day with the family

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep75
programme.desc: Darkest Night - When Stoick is shot down Hiccup and the riders race back to Berk to help

programme.desc: The Ark Of Taujee - The team sets off to rescue the people of the dying lava planet of Tajueer

programme.title: Voltron: Legendary Defender Ep20
programme.desc: Space Mall - Team Voltron travels to an intergalactic mall to purchase lenses needed to power the TeleDav

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep19
programme.desc: The Legends of the Power Gems: Chapter Two - On a quest to find the power gem of fire, Rocky and Bullwinkle travel to Hawaii. They're confronted with another monstrous guardian inside of a volcano in order to retrieve the gem... but wind up losing the gem to a surfing competition that uses it as part of their surf trophy

programme.title: The Adventures Of Rocky And Bullwinkle Ep20
programme.desc: The Legends of the Power Gems: Chapter Three - Rocky and Bullwinkle battle one more guardian to get the final power gem the wind gem. But theyre soon confronted by a tiny ninja squirrel who comes from a floating city of squirrels in the sky and she believes that Rocky is the chosen squirrel promised by prophesy

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep47
programme.desc: Bring Your Kids To Work Day / Leif Erikson - It's Bring Your Kids to Work Day but when the kids act up on the show, the parents must lay down the law...until the adults' parents come on the show.

programme.title: The Mr. Peabody And Sherman Show Ep48
programme.desc: Orchopti-Not-Ron / Mulan - While showing off their new teleportation suits, Peabody and Sherman accidentally teleport inside Orchoptitron without enough juice to teleport out.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep17
programme.desc: The Great Grape Rescue/Sneezyitis - The Mighty Ones meet a courageous grape who inspires them to try to rescue his whole bunch. / When the Mighty Ones, except for Rocksy, all mysteriously get sick at the same time, they begin to fear that they have become allergic to Rocksy and go to great lengths to stay together...apart.

programme.title: The Mighty Ones Ep18
programme.desc: Verry Berry Gets It Together/Fur Mountain - When Verry Berry's adventurous spirit gets her in trouble, she joins up with a colony of army ants to learn discipline. / When Twig disappears into the coat of a dog and cohabitates with a bunch of fleas, the Mighty Ones must convince him that fleas are not his friends.

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep9
programme.desc: The Strength of Scotland - Wally, Wenda and Wizard Whitebeard head to Scotland, where Odlulu is using the Strength Key to give her an advantage in the Highland Games. Wenda competes in the games alongside other Wanderers while Wally and Whitebeard try to get the key from an elusive Fritz!

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free Ep36
programme.desc: Lucky and the Fearless Fillies - When the PALs and Snips get caught in a sandstorm, the girls must keep Snips calm and safe

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep37
programme.desc: Bait With Destiny / Sappy Together - Eep gets jealous when Thunk is invited to join the hunters/Grug and Gran must work together after getting stuck to each other with sticky tree sap

programme.title: Dragons: Race to the Edge Ep36
programme.desc: Between A Rock And A Hard Place - When Hiccup and the Riders discover that Viggo is using two captured Catastrophic Quakens to build a dragon prison, they must help the dragons escape.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back in Business Ep37
programme.desc: Who's a Good Baby? - A brainwashed Boss Baby breaks free from overly sanitized Bubbeezee products. He rallies the Playgroup Babies to run the company out of business by breaking every product in town.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep36
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Confounding Concoction of the Crooked Combotato - A fierce game of plot potato takes an unexpected twist when Melvin unleashes one of his most fiendish -- and carb-loaded -- creations yet.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Dragon Knight Ep10
programme.desc: The Knight's Fall Part 1 - Po and Blade rush to warn the Emperor about the weasels, but he has Po arrested and Colin captures Blade, revealing that she was never a knight. Thrown in a cell, Po reunites with Rukhmini and Mr. Ping, and he copes with the truth about Blade as they break out. Po fights Klaus and Veruca but is outmatched. Blade defeats Colin and hurries to help Po but is too late.

programme.title: Trolls: The Beat Goes On! Ep36
programme.desc: Chummy Sparklestone / Giggleyum - When the Funtime Factory stops producing one of their frosting flavors, Poppy sets out to create a replacement. But is her new flavor, Giggleyum too delicious?/During a Troll mystery party, Cooper has the role of detective. But when the party is over, Detective Cooper now Chummy Sparklestone refuses to break character, and hes causing problems around the village!

programme.title: All Hail King Julien Ep36
programme.desc: Get Off My Lawn - When King Julien thinks he's a crime victim, he buys the village self-defense scorpions from a shady dealer, leaving everyone armed and dangerous.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots Ep36
programme.desc: Pirate Booty - After pirates invade San Lorenzo searching for mystical treasure, Puss leads them on the hunt, hoping his share will defend against the Bloodwolf

programme.title: Where's Wally? Ep36
programme.desc: Blue Moon Over Argentina - Odlulu takes the Guitar Key from Wizard Melodia in order to be the best guitar player in Buenos Aires. Only problem is that the Guitar Key is what Wizard Melodia plays the guitar to control the rising & setting of the blue moon every 2.5 years. Wally and Wenda head to Argentina to help Wizard Melodia get the Guitar Key back and put Buenos Aires back to normal.

programme.title: Team Zenko Go Ep14
programme.desc: Robo-Dog Day Afternoon / Spoiler Alert - New girl in town Felicia shows off her robo-dog but it runs out of control, and TZG must secretly stop the barking bot from wreaking havoc. / When Lula starts gathering birthday wishes from folks around town, TZG secretly keeps her surprise party under wraps.

programme.title: Go, Dog. Go! Ep10
programme.desc: All Paws on Deck / Bonestand and Deliver - Tag wants to do something special for her Mom and Paws anniversary, so she recreates the boat cruise where her parents first met. \ Tag discovers that nothing is planned for Pawstons 100th birthday, so she decides the town needs to rebuild the old Bonestand for a big Pawston concert.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep19
programme.desc: The Case Of Bling's Hidden Present - It's Bling's birthday and she is so excited that she keeps opening all her presents before her party. Noddy needs to make sure she doesn't open the storybook present from him and Big Ears early but he's got to find it first! Big Ears has hidden it and can't remember where he's put it! Noddy launches his investigation to find the missing present before Bling does. Using his investigating skills Noddy follows the clues all over Toyland to find the present before the impatient little Naughticorn. At her birthday party Bling is thrilled to open the present from Noddy and Big Ears. She does have a present to open at her party after all! Well done Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep19
programme.desc: Why Hare Hops - You see there was a time when Hare didn't hop. He was one of the speediest animals in Tinga Tinga but none of the other animals wanted to race with him because Hare always won and it was becoming boring. Then one day, slow but clever Tortoise decides to challenge Hare. Hare can't believe his luck, but Tortoise wins and he wins and he wins! When Hare realizes that it's not such fun being on the losing end, Tortoise finally lets Hare hop past the finishing line in first place! Well it's not good to win all the time. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep19
programme.desc: Heavy Loader - Roary takes Loada on a jaunt to the beach only to discover that sand and lorries don't mix too well!

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep19
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Clippy Claws - Pat has a very special delivery today! Micawber's claws need clipping and Pat needs to deliver not only the claw clippers but Amy the vet too! On the way to the lighthouse though they encounter all sorts of animals needing help today from a poorly Bonnie with a cold to a fretful Pumpkin who doesn't want to take his horse pills! Meanwhile, poor Micawber's claws are so long and he's so upset by getting them tangled up in things like Chris's scarf and the lighthouse tablecloth that he flies out of the window, carrying the tangled lighthouse keys in his claws! Chris tries to get them back and finds himself locked out of the lighthouse altogether! Luckily, Pat and Amy arrive in the SDS helicopter. Pat lowers Amy down to Micawber who is perched on top of the lighthouse and she's soon able to clip his claws and retrieve the keys. Phew! Well done Amy and well done Pat!

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective Ep20
programme.desc: The Case Of The Big Wall Of Bricks - Fuse has a new electronic ball. Noddy suggests that they invite everyone to play with it later. Fuse agrees but when Noddy returns with the other toys there is a big brick wall in front of the workshop. No one can get in and there's no sign of Fuse! Noddy uses all his investigating skills to follow the clues. He discovers that Fuse built the brick wall to stop his friends coming into the workshop because he was worried his new electronic ball might get broken. Noddy helps him feel comfortable with sharing his toy ball after all the other toys promise to be super careful with it. Now everyone can play together! Yay for Noddy!

programme.title: Tinga Tinga Tales Ep20
programme.desc: Why Mosquito Buzzes - You see there was time when Mosquito didn't buzz. Mosquito was as quiet as quiet can be and did she like to tell tales. One day Mosquito tells the Monkeys that the sun looks very low in the sky. Maybe it's sad and doesn't want to rise!' worry the Monkeys. Mosquito flits off to spread the news - The sun is never going to rise again!' soon the whole of Tinga Tinga is in complete panic The Sun is never going to rise again!' Of course, the sun does rise again and all is right again in Tinga Tinga. But the animals decide to tie a grass around Mosquito's tail. From that day on Mosquito buzzes and everyone can swot her away rather than listen to her gossipy tales. Tales from Africa.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car Ep20
programme.desc: Testing Time For Maxi - PC Pete and Nick are up at Silver hatch giving the cars their road tests. Is Maxi really going to be as good as he says he is or will he be unpleasantly surprised?

programme.title: Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service Ep20
programme.desc: Postman Pat And The Sorting Machine - Pat and Jess are called to Cardiff to collect a new sorting machine when the Pencaster machine breaks down. Whilst they negotiate with Rowena Roberts, the Cardiff sorting office manager, as to how to move the heavy machine onto the SDS plane, Ben is fighting his own battles at the Pencaster office as his merry band of helpers from the village cause more chaos in their attempts to sort the post!After a quick tour of Gilbertson Castle, Pat and Jess manage to get the new sorting machine to Pencaster just in time to deliver a missing birthday present to Meera. Happy Birthday Meera and well done, Postman Pat!

programme.title: Dragons: Rescue Riders Ep24
programme.desc: Charged Up - Magnus's superpowered mechano-dragon threatens to replace the Riders. But when it spirals out of control, the town's real heroes have to step up!

programme.title: Dinotrux Ep50
programme.desc: The Return - The Dinotrux return to the crater from their travels to find that D-Structs has taken over and built a huge wall to keep them out.

programme.title: Turbo F.A.S.T. Ep50
programme.desc: Hawaii Five No/Story Of J.J.E.F.F - The crew competes for Burn's affection after she wins a vacation; Turbo and Deuce try to beat Hardcase and make the junior racing league fun again.

programme.title: Home: Adventures With Tip And Oh! Ep50
programme.desc: Big Silly / Smek Chills Out - Smudge tries to prove to Fox and Stick that his monster friend is real/Julio teaches Smek how to "chill out" but Smek takes it too far

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Pony Tales Ep54
programme.desc: The Frontier Fillies Summer Outdoor Jubilee - Lucky's competitive side comes out at the Frontier Fillies' Summer Outdoor Jubilee when the PALs meet the BUDs -- a group of talented young rivals.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free: Pony Tales Ep55
programme.desc: The Frontier Fillies Great Legacy Race - The PALs are determined to place first in a race for the coveted Frontier Fillies Legacy Pin. But the BUDs are willing to do anything to win.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep49
programme.desc: Grugs First Chance / Furry Road - Tired of settling disputes between Valleyites, Grug invents Chance, a two-sided rock that can be flipped to determine all decisions in the Valley; In a nature documentary-style, Thunk tells the story of Beary, a peaceful Thunk-like cub that struggles to fit into a violent bear owl culture

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods Ep50
programme.desc: My Big Fat Gran Wedding / The Strutting Edge - After being called out for having commitment issues by Grug, Gran decides to make the ultimate commitment: marrying Mow!; After embarrassingly choking at the prior Valley's beastie Pageant, Eep asks previous winner Gran to train her to be the best

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep4
programme.desc: The Intruder Flies a Crooked Path - When Jindiao arrives to the Village, he invites the kids to participate in an exhibition match, but has alternative motives

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep6
programme.desc: Poison in the Pit of the Plum - When Po and the kids stop for the night at an Inn, they meet a gang who wants to fight Po and end up down a path to uncovering Jindiao's evil plan

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny Ep5
programme.desc: A Fistful of Herbs - When Po discovers he was poisoned, he sets off to a caravan oasis in the hopes of finding out who the perpetrator is, unknowingly followed by the kid

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep24
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Trashy Tale of the Tumultuous Tubbadump - In honor of Dump Day in Piqua- celebrating the creation of the dump - George and Harold try to earn extra credit by creating a trash-alanche. But Melvin creates an invention to suck all the trash into another dimension. The plan backfires when Tubbadump, a trash-covered monster, emerges from that dimension for revenge on the trashmakers.

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep25
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part I - In part one of a two-part season finale, the Melvins create a final exam that George and Harold will be sure to fail: the Doom Dome. To ensure success, Melvinborg injects Melvin's cells with nanobots, giving him heightened powers. But when George and Harold find out, they crank the nanobots to the max, causing Melvin to grow into a giant! The boys enlist Captain Underpants to fight the jealous nerd, but their victory only loses the nanobots onto Piqua...

programme.title: The Epic Tales of Captain Underpants Ep26
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Taxing Trauma of the Treacherous Tattle Trials Part II - Part two of the season finale finds George, Harold, Captain Underpants, and the Melvins trapped in the Doom Dome with rampaging nanobots. When the humans try to neautralize the bots, they find a new host: Captain Underpants. Now they must shrink down to go into Captain Underpants brain and defeat the nanobots leader, Nanozero. But they need help: Captain Underpants brain cells to the rescue! And when its all over, George and Harold will finally be able to go to summer camp.
